pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# doomsday-clock v0.1.3 **A package to get the current doomsday-clock time.**
## +Info and usage:go to the wiki on the Github Page.## +Install:**manually**- Download project- cd in the project dir with the console- run: `pip install . --upgrade`- your done!**install with pip**- run: `pip install doomsday-clock-status`- your done!### author:@cookie0o on github
